channel.title: Anfernioscape: Development and Progress. [FtW!?]
channel.description:
Howdy. This is my server, AnfernioScape, Just wanted to show you the progress so far. :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD It's decent tbh. (Considering it's based off of Dodain.) These are only a few screenshots... *cough* 19 *cough*
I'm the OWNER, Anfernio, So YEAH... How old are you? Fuck, Why'd you need to know? 11. -_-
Here. Forums: Anfernio.smfforfree2.com Needs client: Yeah...? Are you l33t: Helllllll yeah!?
[b]CREDITS: Zee Best (AKA Blind Mauler) - 20% for Chivalry, Piety, and Lunars. Delta - 20% Bank PINS, Unlimited Running, Entrana home idea... Anfernio - 60% Added new spec bars, Prayer Icons, Skulls, Veng Skulls, GS specs, Home area and so on.[/b]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/zgsspec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/veng2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/spellbook.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/saradomin.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/prayers.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/prayericons2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/prayericon.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/pins.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/newhpbars.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/jad.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/icons.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/homelunars.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/gmaul.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/dfs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/dds.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/clientlogin.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/bgsspec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/ags.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/Spec4bg.jpg[/img]
[b]LATEST PROGRESS MADE INTO THE GAME[/b] [b]-----------------------------------------------------[b/]
New NPC's! [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/seferniopic.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/molishax.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/n00b.jpg[/img]
Fixed the yell channel! (No more "Random Kid" :D) [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/newyell.jpg[/img]
Fixed KQ tunnel! (Still not fully working KQ, I have only the first form.) [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/newemote.jpg[/img]
New LOGIN BACKGROUND! [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/login4.jpg[/img]

item.title: Anfernioscape: Development and Progress. [FtW!?]
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:10, topic:231004”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=304206.msg2439092#msg2439092 date=1221363975]

deltascape…
so it’s an epic (don’t want to say fail soo) not passing grade.

It’s a leech.

Read the Credits.
It’s NOT Deltascape, It LOOKS like it because STEVEN HELPED ME.

In-fact, I’m an Admin on it.
Ever met “Ticktac” in-game?
Exactly.

NO, it is Delta-fucking-scape.

You’re a retard

You notice the fucking “Public chat” button, how it looks gay compaired to the others, and the compass colour, and the lunar, ALL DeltaScape, so fuck off. Stop stealing other people’s work.

Jesus Christ.
Mmkay.
Since you obviously can’t read…

CREDITS:
Zee Best (AKA Blind Mauler) - 20% for Chivalry, Piety, and Lunars.
Delta - 20% Bank PINS, Unlimited Running, Entrana home idea…
Anfernio - 60% Added new spec bars, Prayer Icons, Skulls, Veng Skulls, GS specs, Home area and so on.

Also…
What’s wrong with my “Public Chat”?

Ye…
Gtfo, How ever you got 47 rep…
Don’t know.
[/quote]

Actually, it’s 100% DeltaScape

-His vengeance
-His Lunar
-His client, just renamed, and different backgrounds
-His Godsword GFX
-His server
-His bank pins
-His teleports
-His prayer head icons
-His working skulls
-Piety + Chivalry
-His fucked up “Public chat” button
-His Spellbook swap

EVERY SINGLE FUCKING THING, IS HIS, YOU JUST RENAMED IT, AND CLAIMED IT TO FUCKING BE YOUR OWN, SO FUCK OFF.[/quote]

First off.
Zee Best (AKA Blind Mauler) made the Piety, Chivalry, and Lunar interface.
It’s NOT his Vengeance, In fact, It’s a downloaded model I added into the game.
It’s NOT his Godsword GFX’s INFACT, Tons of people have those.
It’s NOT his Prayer Head Icons. EVERYONE has prayer icons.
It’s NOT his Spellbook swap. Check out the animation. All Lunars is copyrighted to Zee Best.
It’s NOT his “fucked up Public Chat button.” In fact, It’s ZEE BEST’S “Public Chat” Button.
It’s NOT his skulls. A LOT of people have skulls.
It IS his Bank PINS. He gave them to me.
It’s NOT his server. It’s been coded by several people.
It’s NOT his teleports. Everyone has teleports.
It’s NOT his client, In fact, It’s Blind’s v20 client…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 04:43:11 pm[/size][hr]Epic bump.
(New pictures. Gotta make public see!)

Read full topic
